tree.name: G1
tree.assumption: The system operates within normal environmental conditions.
tree.justification: Safety is a critical requirement for this system based on regulatory compliance.

comments.author: chris
comments.content: After adding three context elements, and then deleting the first. I reset all identifiers.

children.name: C1
children.description: This is the second context element added to G1.

children.name: C2
children.description: The first context element that was created was deleted. I am now adding a third context element to G1.

children.name: S1
children.description: This is the first strategy element added as a child of G1.

children.name: P1
children.description: This is the first property claim added to S1.
children.assumption: All relevant stakeholders have been consulted.

children.name: P1.1
children.description: This is a sub-claim of P1.

children.name: P1.2
children.description: This is a second sub-claim of P1.

children.name: P2
children.description: This is the first property claim, originally added to S2 but then moved to S1.

comments.author: chris
comments.content: I'm going to move this property claim to S1.

children.name: P3
children.description: This is the second property claim added to S2, but after moving the first.

children.name: E1
children.description: This is the first evidence element added to P3.
